name: Toolman Terry!
description:
ToolmanTerry is a 2D plat-former with a bullet hell style of gameplay.  Controls are:

Left arrow key - move/swim left

Right arrow key - move/swim right

Up arrow key - swim up

Down arrow key - swim down

S key - shoot

D key/Space Bar - Jump

R Key - Restart Level

YOU GET HIT 5 TIMES YOU DIE :]
